coverSubTitle: Transforming your confidence with world-class care and expertise.
aboutUs: Medica Ray, a licensed hospital in Turkey, specializes in the field of dental implants, plastic surgery, and hair transplantation. Medica Ray provides all treatment and beauty services within its headquarters in Istanbul, in cooperation with the best Turkish hospitals and under the supervision of a professional and integrated medical staff.
TreatmentWelcomeText: Discover a wide range of treatments tailored to meet your needs. Explore detailed descriptions, images, and subcategories to learnmore about what we offer.
ServiceDIDescription: Restore your smile with our advanced dental implant solutions. Precision, comfort, and natural-looking results.
ServiceHIDescription: Reclaim your confidence with our state-of-the-art hair transplant techniques. Natural, lasting results.
ServicePSDescription: Transform and enhance your appearance with our expert plastic surgery procedures. Personalized care.
ServiceFSDescription: Enhance your confidence with our expert facial surgery solutions. Precision, care, and naturally stunning results tailored to you.
